well, he doesn't look split in half, and you can clearly see a arrow lodge in her/his chest, so i want to take a guess and saying that its just some random dead guy that was being hunted by kindred.
Well he probably didn't literally split himself in two, but he split his spirit in two

Guy's wearing a crown and clothes from what seems like some "modern"-era society (relative to League time), with the concept death predating any form of civilisation. So unless they decided to split themselves only recently - and after assuming the role of a King which itself sounds unlikely for Death to sit around + arrow sticking out of chest, I doubt he was them. Especially if tales have been told of two forms of Death, which would take some time to circulate across Runeterra; doubt they have the internet.

It's more likely they're just telling us that even kings can't escape from death's embrace - or something similar to that effect. Since he took the arrow, instead of getting chewed up by Wolf, assuming he accepted his fate after possibly having run through the forest (maybe after sending his subjects to their deaths in an attempt to save himself - doubt he wanted to lead them away since Kindred targeted him specifically, although who knows, maybe it was all of their times).

Aaaand I forgot this was a joke xp. Got caught up overanalysing/building up my own fictional world in my head lol.
